Text saved: After Auggie decided to go to school, he had to face his first day. Like every child starting a new school, he felt very nervous, but because of how he looks, it was a very difficult experience for him. Nobody wanted to sit next to him, and he noticed other children staring at him or talking about him quietly. Luckily, he made friends with Jack, who was a boy in his class, and Summer, a girl he talked with at lunch.

But the first day was not the only hard part. Auggie quickly found out that his classmates did not want to touch him because they were afraid of getting 'the plague'. During the school year, Auggie experienced many strong good and bad times. Then, a surprising and very upsetting event happened at a school camp, which changed everything completely.
